title: The Frozen Volcano
description: Long ago, a magical blizzard froze the great Fire Mountain! Now the Ice Dragon who guards it has gone missing, and the mountain is cracking. Can three brave explorers find the dragon and save the mountain before it shatters?

preview.tagline: Find the legendary Frost Blade and save the mountain!

prologue.worldIntro: Welcome to Fire Mountain - but something is WRONG! A magical blizzard struck years ago, freezing the volcano in ice. The wise Ice Dragon has protected it ever since... but now she's vanished! Without her, the mountain is cracking - fire and ice fighting each other. The King has called for brave explorers to find the Ice Dragon and save the mountain before it shatters into a thousand pieces!

characterIntros.introText: Frost Scout is the bravest explorer in the kingdom! With sharp eyes and quick feet, no path is too dangerous and no mystery stays unsolved.
Ember Keeper has a magical torch that never goes out! It keeps everyone warm and lights up even the darkest caves.
Crystal Singer has the most beautiful voice in the land! Ice crystals dance when she sings, and even grumpy creatures can't help but smile.

prologue.missionBrief: The three explorers must climb the Frozen Volcano, find the missing Ice Dragon, and convince her to return. But the mountain is full of cracking ice, steam vents, and magical creatures. Work together - and you might just save the day!

characters.name: Frost Scout
characters.description: The bravest explorer with sharp eyes and quick feet

characters.name: Ember Keeper
characters.description: Carries a magical torch that never goes out

characters.name: Crystal Singer
characters.description: Has a beautiful voice that makes ice crystals dance

scenes.title: The Cracking Gates
scenes.narrationText: You arrive at the great Ice Gates of Fire Mountain. But the gates are cracking! Chunks of ice fall around you. Steam shoots up through the cracks. You need to get through - fast!

characterTurns.promptText: The gates are frozen solid but cracking!

choices.label: Warm a path with your torch
Find a crack big enough to squeeze through

successOutcome.text: Your torch melts just enough ice to slip through! The ice sparkles as it drips away.

failOutcome.text: The ice is REALLY thick! But your torch makes it glow pretty colors, and you find a gap to wiggle through.

characterTurns.promptText: A baby ice fox is trapped under fallen ice!

successOutcome.text: Your song is so gentle! The fox relaxes and you lift the ice together. It yips happily and follows you!

failOutcome.text: Your song cracks a tiny bit MORE ice - oops! But the fox thinks it's funny and wiggles free on its own.

characterTurns.promptText: The ground cracks beneath you and you start sliding toward a hidden cave! How do you handle the fall?

choices.label: Grab onto the ice and control your slide

successOutcome.text: You grab an icicle and swing yourself down gracefully, landing on your feet in the hidden cave. On the walls, you see ancient carvings of a legendary ice sword. The mountain chose you to find it...

failOutcome.text: You tumble head over heels - WHOMP! You land in a pile of snow at the bottom. But when you look up, you see ancient carvings of a legendary sword on the walls. The mountain chose you to find it...

outcome.resultText: The group splits up! Frost Scout follows the mysterious sword carvings into the ice cave. Ember Keeper and Crystal Singer continue up the main path. You'll meet again at the Dragon's Nest!

scenes.title: The Frost Blade Chamber
scenes.narrationText: You follow the carvings deeper into the cave. They tell a story - long ago, a hero used the Frost Blade to save the mountain. Now the sword waits for a new hero. You can SEE it glowing at the far end - but a deep chasm blocks your path!

characterTurns.promptText: A deep crack in the ice blocks your path - too wide to jump!

choices.label: Find something to bridge the gap
Climb down and back up the other side

successOutcome.text: You spot a fallen ice pillar! You push it with all your strength - it tips, crashes across the gap - PERFECT BRIDGE! You sprint across, grab the Frost Blade from the pedestal, and raise it high. It hums with power. You're ready.

failOutcome.text: You try to climb down but the ice is slippery - you slide to the bottom! You scramble up the other side, heart pounding. But you made it. You pull the Frost Blade from the pedestal and it glows in your hands. Worth it.

outcome.resultText: The Frost Blade is yours! It glows with ancient power. Somewhere above, Ember Keeper and Crystal Singer are making their own way. Time to keep moving!

scenes.title: The Steam Bridge
scenes.narrationText: Ember Keeper and Crystal Singer reach a narrow bridge of ice. Below, hot steam shoots up in bursts! The two explorers need to cross together.

characterTurns.promptText: Steam is blasting up - it might melt the bridge!

choices.label: Use your torch to see the steam pattern

successOutcome.text: Your torch lights up the steam - you can see exactly where it shoots from! 'Follow me!' you say, and find the safe path.

failOutcome.text: A steam burst surprises you - WHOOSH! Your hair gets a little poofy, but you're okay. Crystal Singer giggles and helps you across.

characterTurns.promptText: The bridge is cracking under your feet!

choices.label: Sing a soothing song to the ice

successOutcome.text: You sing a beautiful note and the ice stops cracking! It even seems to get a little stronger. The bridge holds!

failOutcome.text: You run but the ice cracks more - eek! You leap the last bit and land safely. 'That was close!' you laugh.

outcome.resultText: You made it across! The path leads up toward the Dragon's Nest. Somewhere in the caves, Frost Scout is finding his own way...

scenes.title: The Frozen Waterfall
scenes.narrationText: The Frost Blade glows as you near the exit - but a frozen waterfall blocks your path! Huge chunks of ice crash down every few seconds. You need to get through without getting smashed!

characterTurns.promptText: Ice chunks are falling like boulders!

choices.label: Time the falls and sprint through
Use the Frost Blade to carve a path

successOutcome.text: You watch the pattern - CRASH, pause, CRASH, pause - NOW! You sprint through, the Frost Blade lighting your way, sliding under a falling chunk at the last second. MADE IT! You burst through to the other side, sword glowing, ready for whatever's next.

failOutcome.text: You charge forward but the timing's off - a chunk clips your shoulder and spins you around! You stumble through to the other side, clutching the Frost Blade. Bruised but not beaten. You shake it off and keep moving.

outcome.resultText: You made it through! The Frost Blade pulses with energy. Ahead, you hear roaring and crashing - something is happening at the Dragon's Nest!

scenes.title: The Singing Crystals
scenes.narrationText: Ember Keeper and Crystal Singer enter a cavern of singing crystals! The tall ice pillars hum and chime when the wind blows. It's like being inside a giant music box. But the path through is a maze!

characterTurns.promptText: The crystals are confusing - which way is right?

choices.label: Follow the warmest path with your torch
Touch the crystals to find the way

successOutcome.text: Your torch flickers toward the right path - fire knows where to go! 'This way!' you lead Crystal Singer through the maze.

failOutcome.text: You touch a crystal and it makes a LOUD BONG sound! Everyone freezes. But then a tiny crystal creature peeks out and waves you the right way.

characterTurns.promptText: A crystal creature is blocking the exit!

successOutcome.text: You sing the sweetest lullaby! The crystal creature yawns, curls up, and falls asleep right where it is. It's SO cute. You tiptoe past.

failOutcome.text: Your song is a little off-key - oops! But the crystal creature thinks it's hilarious and moves aside, giggling in little chimes.

outcome.resultText: You're through the crystal maze! The path opens up ahead. You can hear Frost Scout's voice echoing from another tunnel... the Dragon's Nest is just ahead!

scenes.title: The Battle at the Dragon's Nest
scenes.narrationText:
You all reach the Dragon's Nest - but it's a BATTLE! Fire is shooting up from below. Ice is cracking and falling from above. The Ice Dragon is in the middle, trying to hold the mountain together, but she's too weak!

'It's too late!' she cries. 'Fire and ice are tearing the mountain apart!'

Then she sees Frost Scout... and the sword in his hand.

'The Frost Blade! You found it! That sword can heal the mountain - but only if you ALL work together!'

The Heart Stone glows red and blue in the middle of the chaos.

'Ember Keeper - you must push back the fire!'
'Crystal Singer - you must calm the falling ice!'
'Frost Scout - you must strike the Heart Stone!'

The dragon roars: 'READY? I need all three of you - NOW!'

characterTurns.promptText: The fire is blocking the path! Use your torch to push it back!

outcome.text: Ember Keeper raises his torch and it blazes HUGE - bigger than ever before! The fire sees a BIGGER fire and backs away, parting like a curtain!

characterTurns.promptText: Ice is crashing down from above! Sing to calm it!

outcome.text: Crystal Singer's voice rings out pure and clear! The falling ice STOPS mid-air, then drifts down gently like snowflakes, dancing to her song!

characterTurns.promptText: The path is clear! Run to the Heart Stone and STRIKE!

outcome.text: Frost Scout RUNS! Fire on his left, ice on his right! He leaps, raises the Frost Blade high, and brings it down PERFECTLY on the Heart Stone - FLASH!!!

outcome.resultText:
A wave of blue-white light explodes from the Heart Stone!

Fire and ice STOP fighting. They swirl together - not crashing, but DANCING! The cracks in the mountain seal. The chaos becomes calm.

The Ice Dragon rises, her eyes bright with tears of joy.

'You did it. ALL of you. The mountain is HEALED!'

She lands before the three explorers and bows her great head.

scenes.title: Heroes of the Mountain
scenes.narrationText:
The Ice Dragon smiles at each of you.

'Ember Keeper - your fire showed the way when all seemed dark. Take this Eternal Ember. It will never go out, just like your courage.'

'Crystal Singer - your song calmed the storm when fear was everywhere. Take this Singing Crystal. It will always remind you of your beautiful, brave voice.'

'And Frost Scout - you found the Frost Blade when no one else could. You struck the Heart Stone when no one else would. Keep the blade. You've earned it, hero.'

The Ice Dragon spreads her wings and takes flight, circling the healed mountain. Rainbow light fills the sky!

And far below, three explorers look up at what they saved - TOGETHER.

ending.title: Heroes of Fire Mountain!
ending.narrationText: The Frozen Volcano is saved! Fire and ice live together in balance again, more beautiful than ever. The King throws the biggest party the kingdom has ever seen. And whenever you look up at Fire Mountain, you can see the Ice Dragon flying in the rainbow sky, watching over her home once more.

characterRewards.description: A magical ember that will never go out
A crystal that sings when you're happy
The legendary sword that saved the mountain
